Plot: Lit professor and gambler Jim Bennett's debt causes him to borrow money from his mother and a loan shark. Further complicating his situation is his relationship with one of his students. Will Bennett risk his life for a second chance?
Title: The Gambler
Actors: Mark Wahlberg, George Kennedy, Griffin Cleveland, Jessica Lange
tomatoConsensus: Well-paced and reasonably entertaining in its own right, The Gambler still suffers from comparisons to the James Caan classic that inspired it.
